title: Hextech Keys keeps going missing
body: So pretty much i have 2 keys right now and whenever i forge a new key and log out the new key goes missing and im straight back to 2, is there like a limit on the amount of keys or something?

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like you crafted a hextech key on the 9th.  You currently only have 1 key fragment, so it won't be possible to craft any more until you obtain 2 more.  You currently have 2 hextech keys, not key fragments.  Hope that helps clear things up!
